# Amiable

<img src="https://heerheer.github.io/Amiable-Doc/Amiable_Icon.png" align="left" height="200" width="200" >

一个Onebot标准的多框架兼容C# Bot开发SDK

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/OneBot-v11-black?logo=data:image/png;base64,)

## 注意
下载前请确保您已经安装了.Net Framework 4.8 开发环境

https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-framework/net48

# 官方文档

https://heerheer.github.io/Amiable-Doc/
